law.catch_line: In Garrett County, the Liquor Control Board is hereby declared to be a State agency to administer th...
law.text: In Garrett County, the Liquor Control Board is hereby declared to be a State agency to administer the provisions of this article and as such is clothed with discretionary powers, in granting, refusing, revoking or suspending licenses for the sale of alcoholic beverages, within the limits prescribed under this article.
